title: See Berlin's most famous landmarks by boat
description: In good weather it's an amazing way to see Berlin's main sights and scenic neighborhoods. In colder weather, the boats have indoor seating as well. Put me on a boat and put a Bier in my hand, and it's all good.

title: Explore the Berlin Wall
description: Take a trip back in time and visit the remaining sections of the Berlin Wall, a powerful symbol of the Cold War era and the division of East and West Berlin.

title: Visit Museum Island
description: Home to a cluster of world-renowned museums and significant historical treasures, Museum Island is an unmissable destination for art and history enthusiasts.

title: Experience Berlin's Street Art
description: Explore the vibrant street art culture in Berlin, known for its colorful murals, graffiti, and urban art installations.

title: Explore Tiergarten Park
description: Take a leisurely stroll through Berlin's largest and most popular park, featuring green spaces, walking paths, and iconic monuments.

title: Discover Potsdamer Platz
description: An iconic public square and bustling intersection, Potsdamer Platz offers modern architecture, shopping, dining, and entertainment options.
